content:
This story was updated July  with new information PERIOD

A shooting occurred Wednesday evening at Six Flags Hurricane Harbor in Arlington resulting in the death of 16yearold Daitrell Teal PERIOD

Teal was shot and transported to the Texas Health Arlington Memorial Hospital emergency room where he died from his injuries at  p.m PERIOD

This was not an active shooter situation according to the Arlington Police Department PERIOD The incident took place outside of the water park at around  p.m PERIOD

An offduty Arlington police officer working a parttime security job at the park heard car horns going off in the parking lot and went out of the front gate to investigate according to a news release from the Arlington Police Department PERIOD

The officer saw six to eight individuals who appeared to be in a physical fight and as he went toward to break up the fight a gunshot went off PERIOD He then saw Teal lying on the ground PERIOD

According to the Tarrant County Medical Examiners Office Teal was shot in the back and his death was ruled as a homicide PERIOD

18yearold Cameron Lavon Stephens was charged with murder and remains in jail after being located at a convenience store on  block of Haverwood Lane by the fugitive unit assigned to the the United States Marshals Service North Texas Fugitive Task Force according to an Arlington Police Chief Alexander Al Jones tweet PERIOD

Anyone with more information can reach out to the Arlington Police Department or to homicide detective Mac Simmons at  PERIOD Tipsters can remain anonymous by contacting Tarrant County Crime Stoppers at 817469TIPS PERIOD

This story is developing and will be updated as more information is released PERIOD
